content: slp st into the 3rd chain of 1st st 104 stitches round 9- change to a chain 3 double_crochet in the next 14 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in the next st double_crochet in the next 15 sts 2 double_crochet in the next st around until the last 8 sts double_crochet in the next 7 sts 2 double_crochet in the last st join with slp st into the 3rd chain of 1st st 110 stitches side of cap round 10- right side change to b chain 3 4 double_crochet into the same st skip next 4 sts 5 double_crochet shell in the next st skip next 4 around join with slp st into the 3rd chain of 1st st 22 shells round 11- change to a chain 1 turn single_crochet into front loop of each st around join with slp st into the 1st single_crochet 110 single_crochet round 12- change to b turn note shell is worked over the single_crochet row into the back loop of the middle double_crochet of previous shell slp st into next 3 sts chain 3 4 double_crochet into same st skip 4 sts 5 double_crochet shell in the next st skip next 4 around join with slp st into the 3rd chain of 1st st 22 shells rnds 13-20- repeat rnds 11 & 12 round 21- repeat round 11 once more round 22- do not change color here chain 2 turn skip next single_crochet double_crochet into next single_crochet double_crochet into skipped single_crochet x-stitch made continue in x-stitch in each st around join with slp st into the 1st double_crochet of the 1st x-stitch skipping over the beginning chain 2 55 x-stitches or 110 double_crochet round 23- chain 1 do not turn single_crochet in double_crochet chain 2 slp st into side of single_crochet picot made single_crochet into next double_crochet around single_crochet in the last st join with slp st in 1st single_crochet 55 picots 55 single_crochet finish off weave in all ends midknightstarr webs com midknightstarr wordpress com midknightstarr@gmail com copyright 2007-2014
